pages.text: Ok recruit, listen up! The first thing you need to do is find some of the precious dimensional residue. Dimensional residue is a near-crystal-like substance that has bled over into our dimension from another one. When harvested we can re-purpose it for ReTCo. $(br2) The ore generates below y-level 30 in small veins
assuming no one has messed with that pesky configuration controller.
